title: Vertigo Bernard Herrmann Joel McNeely Varese Sarabande(Flac)
description:
Vertigo Bernard Herrmann Joel McNeely Varese Sarabande Score

[CD INFO]
1. Prelude and Rooftop
2. Scotty Trials Madeline
(including: Madeline's First
Appearance, Madeline's Car,
The Flower Shop, The Alleyway,
The Mission, Graveyard
and Tombstone)
3. Carlotta's Portrait
4. The Bay
5. By the Fireside
6. The Forest
7. The Beach
8. The Dream
9. Farewell and the Tower
10. The Nightmare and Dawn
11. The Letter
12. Goodnight and the Park
13. Scene d'Amour
14. Necklace and the Return
and Finale

Music composed by Bernard Herrmann
Orchestrated by Joel McNeely - Royal Scottish National Orchestra
Produced by Robert Townson
Recording Engineer Geoff Foster
Recorded at City Halls, Glasgo on September 15th and 18th, 1995
Cover Art and Photography by Matthew Joeph Peak
Mastered by Joe Gastwirt at Ocean View Digital Mastering
Special Thanks to Harry Garfield, Paul Hughes,
Kevin Mulhall, Jacqueline Noltingk, Ridge Walker,
Myra Elaine Simon and the musicians of the Royal Scottish National Orchestra

[FLAC COMPRESSION SETTINGS]
Compression level 8

Encoded with dBpoweramp CD Ripper.
